summary: Abasin Anwary is a Litigation Support Professional with more than 6 years of eDiscovery experience spanning across various phases of the EDRM framework model.  Abasin has experience in the Collection, Processing, Analysis, and Production phases of the EDRM model.In addition to his strong analytical, troubleshooting and technical acumen, Abasin has had the extraordinary opportunity of working at both large scale as well as small scale eDiscovery vendors gaining experiences in Project Coordination, Project Management, and Operational eDiscovery. First impressions matter, each time! Therefore, Abasin places great emphasis on quality and ensures that final deliverables are free of all errors – it is easier to double or triple check a deliverable against errors than to allow the client to discover them.Moreover, Abasin has a solutions-oriented approach to processes and data. He strives to continuously improve workflows and processes through careful analysis, documentation, and review of important data. Identifying and breaking bottlenecks is important to achieve new results, orchestrate new processes, and continue the process of achieving excellence within a system.Abasin works to constantly improve his industry knowledge and expertise. He currently holds multiple certifications in the areas of Electronic Discovery and Systems Administration.He's also Six Sigma certified.
name: Abasin Anwary, CSSGB
title: Open to eDiscovery Opportunities
